Uses of Class
jpcap.NetworkInterface

  • Packages that use NetworkInterface 
    Package Description
    jpcap
    Provides classes and interfaces for capturing packets from a network interface, sending packets to a network interface, reading packets from a file, and writing packets to a local file.
    Scanner
    Provides the classes necessary to create the Scanner Application

    • Uses of NetworkInterface in jpcap

      Methods in jpcap that return NetworkInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NetworkInterface[] JpcapCaptor.getDeviceList()
      Returns the interfaces that can be used for capturing.
      Methods in jpcap with parameters of type NetworkInterface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JpcapSender JpcapSender.openDevice(NetworkInterface device)
      Initializes a network interface for sending a packet, and returns an instance of this class.
      static JpcapCaptor JpcapCaptor.openDevice(NetworkInterface intrface, int snaplen, boolean promisc, int to_ms)
      Opens the specified network interface, and returns an instance of this class.
